mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EX_IDX) AS EXECPTCNT FROM BM_EXCEPTION WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EX_DT DESC, EX_STATUS ASC) AS ROWNUM ,EX_IDX ,CASE WHEN EX_SYSGBN='B' THEN (SELECT AD_NAME FROM BM_ADMIN WHERE AD_IDX=EP.MB_IDX) END AS MB_NAME , MB_IDX ,CASE WHEN EX_SYSGBN='B' THEN 'BMS ADMIN' END AS ST_NAME ,ST_CODE ,CASE WHEN EX_SYSGBN='B' THEN 'BMS' END AS EX_SYSGBN ,EX_CLASS,EX_TYPE,EX_MSG,EX_TRMSG ,EX_IP,EX_OS,EX_BROWSER,EX_BRVER,EX_AGENT,EX_DT ,EX_STATUS, EX_COMMENT FROM BM_EXCEPTION AS EP WHERE 1=1
) AS TT WHERE TT.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{beginNum} AND #{endNum}

SELECT EX_IDX ,CASE WHEN EX_SYSGBN='B' THEN (SELECT AD_NAME FROM BM_ADMIN WHERE AD_IDX=EP.MB_IDX) END AS MB_NAME , MB_IDX ,CASE WHEN EX_SYSGBN='B' THEN 'BMA' END AS ST_NAME ,ST_CODE ,CASE WHEN EX_SYSGBN='B' THEN 'BMS' END AS EX_SYSGBN ,EX_CLASS,EX_TYPE,EX_MSG,EX_TRMSG ,EX_IP,EX_OS,EX_BROWSER,EX_BRVER,EX_AGENT,EX_DT ,EX_STATUS, EX_COMMENT FROM BM_EXCEPTION AS EP WHERE EX_IDX=#{EX_IDX}
